Table of Contents

Name

AuWaveFormToString - return string description of wave form.

Synopsis

#include <audio/audiolib.h>

char *AuWaveFormToString(waveform)
unsigned int waveform;

Arguments

waveform Specifies the waveform. Currently the following waveforms are defined: AuWaveFormSquare, AuWaveFormSine, AuWaveFormSaw, AuWaveFormConstant.

Description

AuWaveFormToString returns a string description of wave_form or «unknown» if it isnt recognized.

See Also

AuStringToWaveForm.

audiolib - Network Audio System C Language Interface
